Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Debi B
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at this location for a work training. The staff at this location made the three of us in our party feel very welcome. The room was exceptionally clean and provided all needed amenities. The staff was able to direct us to an excellent restaurant. I will definitely be staying here again:_

Reviews.Title: “fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: Hoosier1974
Reviews.Content: Getting ready to book room at Jameson for probably 8th time for yearly meeting & other Indy visiting times. All you'd want for a midprice hotel. Always Clean, updated bedding, comfortable, breakfast. Most wonderful is the lovely location nestled in little wooded area just off the busy highway,, with no noise. So close to so much on the Indy/Carmel northside.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: S8epilot
Reviews.Content: We booked on hot-wire. Very nice and clan for the price. Breakfast (free) has nice DIY waffles.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place to be”
Reviews.Author: jdh1976
Reviews.Content: My wife and I and another couple stayed at the Jameson Inn Carmel for our anniversaries. We each had a king bed room. The room was very clean and the staff very friendly. Check in and check out was easy. The breakfast was excellent. They offered the normal fare plus biscuits and gravy. The bed was very comfortable. We all felt safe and secure with the area. The price was alot cheaper than the other area motels and hotels. Very much worth the price we paid. Most definatly will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Ashley --”
Reviews.Author: tom m
Reviews.Content: Ashley --, the young lady who checked me in both times I stayed here, is a super winner. I am 67 yrs old and have stayed at hundreds of hotels over the years. NEVER have been so impressed with a hotel employee as I was with Ashley. She was perfect in every way from the minute I called for a room (two different times in about a week) until I left, she was great. She definitely an employee to be proud of and keep as long as you are able. Thanks to you and especially to Ashley Tom Marshall

Reviews.Title: “Excellent guest services, rooms a bit dated"”
Reviews.Author: mikkimal
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival the front desk staff was wonderful and were throughout our stay. We ended up having to move rooms because the room was supposed to be non smoking but was on the smoking floor and my kids have asthma. The hallway had a very strong smoke odor. They were very accommodating and moved us to a suite on the first floor because they didn't have any other rooms except on the upper floor which is the smoking level. Breakfast was average, kid friendly. Big indoor pool, the kids loved it. Rooms are a bit stuffy/old and dated. You can tell they've made some improvements with new carpet & bedspreads. There's a fridge & microwave in all rooms. If we are back in the area we will stay again and just request a first floor room now we know the 3rd floor is for smokers.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly adequate for a one-night stay”
Reviews.Author: eliseLouisville_Ky
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night and it was fine. The hotel is located in a very nice area, right off 465 on the north side of the city and is convenient to restaurants. The parking lot feels extremely safe and there is a pretty little lake right in front with a gazebo. The lobby is nice, however, on the second floor, the hallways were musty and the air conditioning blew all night. The hall was very quiet, the only sound I heard was the refrigerator trickling. Other than that, we were very pleased with the hotel. The breakfast buffet was adequate, but nothing to write home about. My only complaint would be that the hotel needs to hire a separate person to work the buffet in the morning, because the poor woman in charge of refilling everything was running back and forth trying to answer the phone at the front desk between buffet refills! Also, a little more fresh fruit, like bananas and apples, would be nice -- all that was available the morning we left were oranges. We booked this hotel through expedia's 'blind' booking where you pick the area and number of stars and they pick the hotel. We paid $50.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: TexanMan0914
Reviews.Content: From the time we got picked up At the airport till the time we got dropped of after our stay we were treated like FAMILY by all Customer facing staff. Especially a Fantastic Houskeeper / Shuttle driver (Michele). Michele always went out of her way to make sure we had a great stay at the Jameson. When I think of Hotels to stay at in Indy I only think of the face of the Jameson Michele. I will be Back Thank You Michele.

Reviews.Title: “The nicest people and place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: mameod
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean and roomy for three adults. The service was FANTASTIC!!!! They were kind enough to pick us up at the airport on Sunday night and brought us to the hotel. A little while later they drove us to a restaurant to eat dinner and then came back and picked us up later. They provided a continental breakfast which hit the spot to start the day. They then drove us to the medical building we needed to go to. Of course, when we were done at the doctor's office they came back to pick us up and took us to the airport. The two drivers we had while we were there were SO NICE and FRIENDLY!! The staff at the front desk were also very nice and helpful. WE highly recommend this hotel and look forward to staying there again when we are back in Indianapolis. Thank you very much to all the staff at the Jameson Inn Carmel. We really appreciate your kindness and welcoming ways!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Carol06
Reviews.Content: The Jameson Inn was clean and rooms decorated nicely. Employees were nice and helpful. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “good location, great price”
Reviews.Author: kate8989
Reviews.Content: jameson inn was a very welcome experience. the location for my business needs were perfect missed alot of the city traffic and easy accesss to all freeways needed room was clean and spacious, as well as, good temperature control. all staff was helpful and friendly would definately recommend this hotel value was great as well

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value, Very Good People”
Reviews.Author: Bananaman3m
Reviews.Content: While the hotel provided the necessary standards, it was the people that were exceptional. They went out of their way to make your stay pleasant. Airport pick-up was the reason we decided on the Jameson, as we did not have access to a car. In the evening, they were happy to take us to our choice of restaurants, and then returned to pick us up when we called.

Reviews.Title: “Free shuttle service to the airport and a lot more.”
Reviews.Author: XX_Chaos_XX
Reviews.Content: This small hotel is great for the price. It has an indoor pool, and gym for those that want to get some exercise. There is a free shuttle available to take you to the airport and other places. Internet is not the greatest but its free. Staff is very friendly. I agree that loud noises can be heard from the hallway though. So overall i's say a 3.5, but for the price it gets a 4.

Reviews.Title: “Spare yourself from a total nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Jen313
Reviews.Content: We've notified the Hamilton County Health Department about this place and hopefully it will be thoroughly cleaned or condemned. I can't imagine how it can operate with the total lack of management we observed: We arrived at 10 p.m. with a paid reservation and were given a room key -- to a room where an employee had locked himself inside! -- and peeked out thru the security lock.... He claimed to be working on the door lock -- isn't that on the outside of the door??? Said he wasn't finished, it'd be a half hour.... So we asked for another room. The manager gave us a key to a room with a king bed -- for the 3 of us. So, we headed downstairs yet again for a different room key. (There were only about a dozen cars in the lot, they were FAR from booked...) No appologies, no concern for my exhausted 79 yo mother standing in the hall... This room had 2 queen beds, a ceiling lined with mold, distinct mold smell, hot, humid, stuffy, a bathroom door that was literally falling apart and wouldn't close, and a towel rack that was sitting on top of the toilet below holes in the wall. There wasn't even an exhaust fan in the bathroom -- who in their right mind builds a bath without an exhaust fan??? We were too exhausted to see what a 4th room would offer. We turned the ac on high and went to sleep despite the extremely noisy arctic blast which was finally defusing the mildew smells. Then @ 4 a.m. the alarm went off. 10 min. later the radio came on... Then there was the "breakfast" -- rotten apples, a good orange, the only non-white bread or solid starch offering was raisin bran. While a woman was "stocking" the "breakfast bar" very slowly (tho it was high breakfast time) many things were empty (raisin bran and milk...). At least they had tea. We usually stay at the Jameson on Kelly St., which is fine, but I simply got the wrong one when booking on Expedia because they are so close. Kelly St. isn't a glamourous address, while this is, but managment here must be totally absent. It looks beautiful on the outside,but don't risk your health when there are dozens of other hotels around.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, clean, friendly!”
Reviews.Author: lkinnyc
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean, the rooms are nice and the staff is quite friendly. I was staying with my extended family for a family reunion and the staff was very accommodating including providing free shuttle service to many of the weekend events and back and forth from the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: plan09
Reviews.Content: I got a room for an amazing price on Hotwire and was very pleased. The hotel has a 21/2 star rating that I don't understand. The rooms were large and clean, the staff was friendly and the breakfast of waffles, sasuage gravy and biscuits among other offerings was good. It is a short distance off the highway as well. The only negative was the sound from the hall did carry.

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better”
Reviews.Author: travelbuddy24
Reviews.Content: The beds were very hard and made for a tough night's sleep, but the pillows were soft. We found garbage behind a chair, which makes us question the cleanliness of the hotel. They only gave us two tissues in the tissue boxes. Also the shower head and knobs were coming out of the wall. The staff was very pleasant and welcoming. They were very attentive during breakfast service and made sure it well stocked. Breakfast was continental with make your own waffles and biscuits and gravy. Parking is free. It's better to spend your money on another hotel that is more comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: pk2211
Reviews.Content: The staff was very helpful and went above and beyond the expected to make our three night stay enjoyable. The rooms were comfortable and the breakfast was good. The only negative points were the pool heater was broken and a chain rattled on the flagpole all night our first night and could clearly be heard in our room. Keep in mind it was Thanksgiving weekend and the Hotel was not as fully staffed to deal with these problems as it normally would be. We received four star service at a two star price.

Reviews.Title: “friendly service--feel welcome!”
Reviews.Author: ChrisLF
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel a few nights every month over the last year. Always same friendly service, everything always ship-shape, sometimes I use the microwave and refrigerator and avoid restaurant food.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here every week”
Reviews.Author: chenry2899
Reviews.Content: I stay here at minimum three nights a week and its great. Everyone is very friendlly, helpful and accomadating!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, Comfortable rooms, great service”
Reviews.Author: nss_09
Reviews.Content: I am a frequent traveller to Indianapolis and requires to stay for a while for my business trips. I found Jameson Inn at Indy Carmel best suited for my extended stays as it gives me comfortable stay with absolute peace. They have a awesome shuttle service which you can use any time during the day. I would say Jameson Inn offers you best return for your bucks. Have a nice stay!!

Reviews.Title: “nice staff, comfortable beds, wooded setting”
Reviews.Author: tabascoi812
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Jameson 2 weeknights. They have comfortable beds and friendly staff. It's a very nice neighborhood, and I would have felt safe there by myself. The parking is free, and the grounds have tall old oaks. We did not try the pool or exercise room, or the free breakfast. I did use the WIFI, and it worked fine. We also got a great deal on priceline.

Reviews.Title: “Always a Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: tekne1
Reviews.Content: I frequent the Jameson hotels in Indianapolis for business travel, and I’m always satisfied with my stay. The Jameson in Carmel is by far my favorite. The staff is beyond friendly and they even cleaned off my car the morning after it snowed. The décor is the most tolerable I’ve seen at a business class hotel. The lobby is comfortable and friendly. There is a computer in the lobby with printer available to guests. The rooms are very large, clean, and nicely appointed. The rooms have fridges/microwaves, plentiful outlets, and wireless internet. Breakfast is your typical free continental breakfast and cookies are provided in the evening. The indoor pool and workout rooms are very nice. I would stay at this hotel when traveling for any reason.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean & comfortable; excellent value”
Reviews.Author: september_7
Reviews.Content: I recently spent 5 nights at the Jameson. I pretty much hibernated in my room recovering from surgery and didn't want room service. I left garbage bags & wrapped up used towels outside my room around maid service time. Without my having to ask, they left a daily privacy bag with soap, fresh towels, shampoo & coffee outside my door. My room was clean & equipped with a coffee pot, mini-refrigerator and microwave all of which were very clean. There were no visible carpet, wall or comforter stains that are quite common in most hotels for that price level. All in all, a nice place to stay for a very reasonable price.

HotelInfo.Name: Jameson Inn Indianapolis-Carmel
HotelInfo.Address: 10201 North Meridian Street, Indianapolis, IN 46280
